wiki.content: According to the Heartbreak Warfare Songfacts, this song shares the same theme of a number of tracks on Battle Studies, the message being that love is truly a battlefield. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the Heartbreak Warfare Songfacts, this song shares the same theme of a number of tracks on Battle Studies, the message being that love is truly a battlefield.

track.name: Heartbreak Warfare
